channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Senator Lummis files Amicus Brief supporting Coinbase's dismissal motion against SEC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Senator Lummis argued that the SEC is attempting to “circumvent the political process” by establishing itself as the main authority on crypto.

item.title: 3AC co-founder avoids contempt charges following evidence of Singaporean citizenship
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Lawyers for Kyle Davies filed evidence that his U.S. citizenship had been renounced in 2021, which, according to a bankruptcy judge, left him outside the court's jurisdiction.

item.title: Crypto Biz: PayPal’s stablecoin goes live, Bitstamp seeks capital, and Coinbase's L2
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: This week’s Crypto Biz explores PayPal’s stablecoin, Coinbase’s new layer 2 network, Bitstamp’s fundraising and the growing popularity of crypto bots on Telegram.

item.title: Scientists used AI to find and track 95K ‘cryptocurrency free giveaway’ scams on Twitter
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The San Diego State University team uncovered nearly a million dollars were scammed from victims via the Lists feature on Twitter — now called X.

item.title: Price analysis 8/11: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, DOGE, ADA, SOL, MATIC, LTC, DOT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: After the Aug. 11 Bitcoin ETF decision delay, BTC’s boring price action looks set to carry on through the weekend.

item.title: US gov’t debt downgraded — Huge news for Bitcoin?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Cointelegraph analyst and writer Marcel Pechman explains why the downgrading of U.S. government debt will negatively impact the price of Bitcoin over the next few months.

item.title: Judge revokes Sam Bankman-Fried’s bail, remands him to custody: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Sam Bankman-Fried was reportedly led out of a New York courtroom in handcuffs after alleged attempts to influence or intimidate witnesses in his criminal case.

item.title: Bitdeer’s losses widen in Q2 after one-time $33M listing fee, shares up 44%
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The company entered into a $150 million share purchase agreement with B. Riley Financial on Aug. 10.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: SEC decision on Bitcoin ETFs won’t leave out Wall Street giants
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission’s prolonged deliberation over a spot Bitcoin ETF is stoking expectations of a joint decision for all applications.

item.title: Bitcoin futures open interest at 2023 high while BTC trading volume at yearly low — What gives?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: BTC futures open interest is on the rise, but Bitcoin trading volume suggests that traders have shifted their attention to other markets.

item.title: SEC punts on ARK 21Shares spot Bitcoin ETF, opens proposal to comments
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: ARK Investment Management founder and CEO Cathie Wood predicted on Aug. 7 the SEC would delay its decision on the firm’s spot BTC ETF application.

item.title: FC Barcelona secures $132M investment for blockchain and NFT venture
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The football club has been keen on creating nonfungible token collections for much of the past year.

item.title: Google BARD vs. ChatGPT vs. Ernie: The AI chatbot race and Web3
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Vinita Rathi
item.description: By now you must be aware of the AI market being on a steady rise and heralding global news headlines.

item.title: Hong Kong securities regulator issues in-principle approval to HKVAX
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The announcement comes after Hong Kong debuted crypto retail trading with exchanges HashKey and OSL.

item.title: TradFi shifts perspectives on crypto assets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zain Jaffer
item.description: But again, there was a progression where the analog versions of this entertainment content were with us. So, many of us in the older crowd have grown to accept that progression.

item.title: Grails’ lucky dip of famous NFT artists, new hope for PFP holders: NFT Collector
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Greg Oakford
item.description: Pudgy Penguins CEO reveals why PFT holders aren’t doomed, Grails offers a blind tasting to buy famous NFT artists, and free Amazon Prime NFTs.

item.title: 5 things crypto must get right for mainstream adoption to happen
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tomer Warschauer Nuni
item.description: Mainstream crypto adoption will require an enormous effort, and it’s still likely to be several years away.

item.title: Global access to Web3: Understanding cultural differences
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Wolfgang Rückerl
item.description: While crypto was invented to provide an alternative to the traditional banking system, converting to and from fiat currency is still necessary in many cases.

item.title: The next big leap for Ethereum liquid staking: The staking landscape
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Mohak Agarwal
item.description: It is essential that we engage in extensive research and relentlessly test and build solutions that help solve these challenges and build a resilient architecture.

item.title: Binance applies for Taiwan AML compliance: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The world’s leading crypto exchange by trading volume has reportedly applied to register in Taiwan under the new AML compliance.

item.title: US regulators consider regulating political deep fakes ahead of 2024 election
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The U.S. Federal Election Commission unanimously voted to advance a petition to regulate political ads that use artificial intelligence.

item.title: Worldcoin opens up WLD reservations for unverified users
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Worldcoin project has remained controversial right from its announcement and is currently facing regulatory trouble in multiple jurisdictions where it has launched.

item.title: Bitcoin trader reveals ‘important’ BTC price zone as bulls hold $29.3K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin traders continue to battle for control of a rangebound market — but some nearby BTC price levels are more significant than others.

item.title: Visa explores crypto gas fees payments through cards
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Visa’s innovative solution employs Ethereum’s ERC-4337 standard and the “Paymaster” smart contract, enabling off-chain gas fee settlement.

item.title: ‘XRP is not a security. Period’ — Crypto lawyers on Ripple’s case amid SEC appeal
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Lawyer Oscar Franklin Tan believes that if the appeal is allowed, whoever wins will build momentum in the main case.

item.title: California commission outlines campaign disclosure requirements for crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: The California Fair Political Practices Commission has released disclosure requirements for cryptocurrency contributions to political candidates and committees.

item.title: Canada to develop repository for storing crypto and NFT seizures
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police is seeking a digital asset solution to facilitate the seizure and storage of cryptocurrency and nonfungible tokens.

item.title: Bitcoin ETF momentum runs out as crypto market enters summer slump: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Research
item.description: DeFi and NFTs remain deep in the bear market while crypto stocks see an upside.

item.title: Coinbase layer-2 network Base hits 136,000 daily active users
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Around 30% of Base’s users on Aug. 10 were new to the blockchain, which launched only a day prior.
